content.detailedDescription: Late night in 1968? about 10pm.All three of us in bed, mom & i in one bed mom had been paralyzed for several years, i slept with her all the time. sister in other room, we are giggling, mom says listen all the sound has stopped. not even crickets making noise, our fridge stopped making sounds and the clock stopped ticking. all of a sudden the curtain that we hung in the doorway blows up without any breeze or wind. this thing moved slowly in the room, not touching the floor. mom said don't look,! but i peeked squinting my eyes it  came right up to mom & i and stared into my eyes, it had large black shinny almond shaped eyes. then it ran it's three long wrinkly fingers down both our arms at the same time & stopped at our hands i was hugging mom. it was ice cold to the touch. it must have put us asleep because after a while i opened my eyes and it was not in front of us anymore, i turned my head to look into sister's room and saw two small gray beings holding up my sister's legs, straight up in the air. she was quiet. the two of them looked up as if they were communicating with a third entity in the room i couldn't see that far into the room, the two looked at me and them returned to what they were doing, the next thing i know i woke up again looked back to see if they were with sister, they were gone. i got up out of bed and looked out the window because a light had caught my eye, i saw a large form moving up the hill of our dirt road, headed towards my uncle's house. it wasn't touching the ground. it was still dark out so i made my way to the front door to see it but as soon as i got to the door it was morning. my mom said she believes it was her grandma checking on her. i thought so too because it had feminine qualities & some kind of long white thin hair & wrinkled skin. we never talked about it after that night. blew it off as a ghost spirit. after all these years later i realized it wasn't a ghost. it was something i didn't understand. after seeing tv shows about aliens i was sure that is what we saw. what are known as the greys. i would love to undergo hypnosis to know all the details. i have a bump in my knuckle on the hand that got touched. i'm not sure if they caused it but i never noticed it until after the experience. i plan on having it x rayed to find out what it is.
content.summary: Late night, mom & i in bed, sister in other room, entity floats in our room.

content.detailedDescription: There was a storm front and i decided to take a few pictures of the two fronts meeting. i took several pictures observing the clouds by eye and through the display on my camera and didn't see anything odd. after i pulled them up on my phone and started to look back at them i noticed this black object seeming to come out of the clouds in one picture and in a different area in the sky in another. i and my wife were both outside and didn't see this object until looking at the photos.
content.summary: Black object invisible to the human eye and not seen until picture was reviewed

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside at about 9 p.M. (dusk) to aid loading my nephew's car.  i looked up into a mostly clear sky to the west with some clouds to the north and saw what looked like a sort of semi-transparent cloud streaking at a high rate of speed from south to north for about 6 seconds.  it started roughly 20 degrees above the horizon when i noticed it and running nearly parallel to the horizon, ended perhaps 10 degrees higher before suddenly disappearing in clear air.  there was no noise. in size, it looked roughly the size of my thumb nail at arms length. my impression watching it was that this cloud-like object had right angles within its body, sort of giving it the look of a semi-manufactured structure. 

amazed, my first thought was how could a cloud move that fast.  then, it being july 4th, i thought it might be some kind of firework except that there was no smoke, no trail, no fire, no illumination of any kind.  just a gray cloud moving rapidly without changing shape or dissipating. there was no way it could be smoke left over from some firework detonating. such smoke doesn't streak across the sky intact.  (there were people starting to light fireworks, but their fireworks were unmistakable.)   i then thought it might be a plane, but aside from deviating from the usual flight path in my neighborhood, there were no lights and it simply didn't look like a solid object.  moreover, it moved much faster than any plane i've seen around my residence. (charlotte douglas airport is a few miles north of me so there's steady air traffic overhead.)   after it disappeared, i looked to see if anyone else was watching it.  my nephew hadn't noticed it and what neighbors i could see were engrossed in their festivities. i went inside the house and told the family i had just seen my first ufo, so called because i had no idea what i had just seen.  they just looked at me blankly.
content.summary: What looked like a cloud streaking across the sky at high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: I walked out my front door at 11:40 p.M. on 7-4-15 with my adult son. i saw a big orange-red glow above my line of vision. i knew it was not fireworks or an airplane because it was not moving and was too low. it appeared to have a glowing aura around it, and i could see a triangle shape within the glowing aura. my son and i watched it for a couple of minutes, then it began to move toward the north. i went inside the house to get the binoculars. i was not able to see much other than a ball of orange light because it had moved further away, among the treetops. at one point, it stopped for about a minute or less and then moved on and disappeared. i felt i had actually seen a ufo because i had never seen anything like this before. i told my son to film it with his phone, but all he got, by that time, was an orange ball in the sky, moving north.
content.summary: Bright orange glow hovering close by with triangle shape in middle, headed n, stopped and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down us 19 to work and noticed 1 object in air, thought it to be an airplane or helicopter at first then noticed it was something else by the time i realize that i wasn't looking at a known aircraft i saw another one and tried to capture a picture but couldn't because i was driving fast on the highway and then i noticed the third one which i saw really well because i was kind ofparallel with the object it was triangular shaped with sort of rocket like exhaust pipes i want to say on the back and bright  lights under neath  they were not flashing or blinking just  stationary circles of white lights
content.summary: There were 3 triangular objects hovering in a certain area , first 2 then another slowly like glided towards the others and also began to hover

content.detailedDescription: I thought maybe a tower at first
content.summary: Best way to describe,hovering chandelier colorful lightsat first sight i thought it was a tower

content.detailedDescription: In about 1957 i was a teenager just too young to drive so my friends and i walked a lot in our rural neighborhood.  one summer night we had snuck away from our sleepover in the middle of the night to raid cherry trees.  two of my friends and i were walking along a rural asphalt road in pitch blackness when we were bathed in a brilliant beam of light that came from straight above us.  the beam was just large enough to circle the three of us and extremely bright, bright enough that we could see each other like it was daylight.  i don't think any of us looked up; so we didn't see what was making the light.  it stayed stationary for about 5 minutes and went out and it was completely black again.  it didn't move across us like a moving object, just shined straight down on us.  it was absolutely quiet before, during and after the event.  there were no aircraft in our part of the sky and i was familure with the sound of a helicopter, and there was no such sound.  i know the city of wichita didn't even have a helicopter in those days.  i just know that something very silent lit us up with a spotlight that didn't move for several minutes in total darkness as if they wanted to get a good look at us and then went away
content.summary: Bright beam lit me and 2 others up on rural road in black of night silent

content.detailedDescription: Our family was dining on an outdoor balcony of a restaurant.  we noticed an enormous hawk on the roof of a nearby building. we took some pictures with our cell phones.  one of the pictures showed a disk like object in the background. it is odd that none of us actually saw the object, it only showed up on the one digital picture.
content.summary: Ufo showed up on a digital picture

content.detailedDescription: Got a mysterious blinking ufo, started in top right hand corner of video, included a screenshot of where ufo blinking begins. the object has no aviation lights or strobe but intermittently blinks about every ten seconds. it slowly moves around for about nine minutes and then seems to fade away. very strange and not likely a satellite because of it's strange movement. thanks.
content.summary: Blinker ufo video

content.detailedDescription:
Back yard waiting for fireworks,local town cancelled program unknown to me.
noticed a lone light in distance(where another town just finished display)
first thought it was part of display.But it continued toward my area.As it got closer noticed a blurry shape to it,at that point thought aircraft was 
in trouble but if so it would be decending.As it got closer noticed the c
hanging light pattern and noticed what appeared to be flares being dropped
2 at a time (color same as  craft)lasting about 1-2 seconds.It did not pass directly over me and kept its  course . there was no sound to it.I have large oak trees in my yard i lost the craft behind trees. my last visual it seemed to change course westerly.I was both awed and spooked at what i saw. i later realized that no commercial aircraft flew overhead as they usually do during this time. pittsburgh has approach and departure
corridors in the area. i admit it took awhile to get to sleep.Hope this may help
content.summary: Observed light (after fireworks) slowly moving toward my location kept same altitude moved slowly

content.detailedDescription: On a nightly basis for the last two and a half months have obeserved, with mg girlfroend, over the house, a number of triangle, cigar, disc, and cone shaped ufos moving in patterns and colors checked above. from loud hums and buzzes over to see long cylindrical crafts flying tree toplow over the house. have gad many people over who will also vouch for unexplained  activity. seen multiple crafts loaded onto motherships on nightly basis. i challenge anyone to not see something above the house at any night and would invite investigations from you
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two and half months. every night

content.detailedDescription: This is subpar iphone footage of two ufo's that maneuvered over renton washington during the new year's fireworks display. the first craft hovered for a minute, maneuvered in the sky and then quickly flew straight up and was lost in the stars. the second craft was further west and appeared lower and closer to fireworks in the distance; then rapidly accelerated on a flat line trajectory west, towards the pacific. both appeared to have a reddish orange ring, or gas like outer coating with a dark hull. i'm at a loss for words, what we saw is both awesome and unexplainable. this footage doesn't do justice the experience but the way they maneuver effortlessly in sporadic patterns is clearly evident. 2013!!!! what a way to start off the new year, and to our visitors; fly closer!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo over renton wa during the fireworks display.

content.detailedDescription: It was july 4, 2015 exactly 9:37pm. we were watching fireworks. an orange/reddish glowing object appeared from the northwest and continued southeast than turned towards the east and traveled up and disappeared. couple minutes later a 2nd one appeared from the same location, traveled same direction of the 1st one. 2nd one hovered a little longer between my house and my neighbors than turned east and disappeared as well.
content.summary: Orange/red glowing object with aura. there was an outline looked grayish. first one appeared northwest and went  southeast than made a turn  east and disappeared.  2nd did the same exact pattern and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
this sighting happened while i was serving as an mp in the us army in april of 2011.

 my self and a friend who were on duty mps (military police) at the time were smoking in the empty parking lot of iron horse park on fort carson just south of colorado springs colorado. we were in the park for about 15 min before we noticed an odd light coming out of the north west over pikes peak. at first i thought it was the light form the weather station on top of the peak but then the light changed color that is when i asked my friend to look at it as well. we continued to observe the object as it moved from the north west to the south east at an extremely high rate of speed as it moved toward our position it changed color form a hazy white to a bright orange then a deep red. it pulsed between these colors as it moved to the south east. after the object reached the south east  the object then stopped  and made a 90 degree turn toward the sky and climbed out of sight at a almost unbelievable speed the whole ordeal lasted approximately 45 seconds. i contacted our police dispatch center after that to find out if there were any apache helicopter units using the live fire ranges, no ranges were active that night. my friend and i then decided not to report the sighting officially in fear that we would be removed form our mp duties.
content.summary: Ball of light that moved extremely fast and made sharp turns and changed color

content.detailedDescription: Full carload of people witnessed. i pulled over the car because it looked strange. i got out there was no sound. it was a sphere shape and was moving slow and seemed to give off an orange glow to it, it was not pulsating, but the orange color changed a little.After moving it seemed to hover for a few minutes and then went up and /or behind a cloud. although i didn't notice obvious clouds as i was able to see plenty of stars as well.
content.summary: Orange orb. was moving and then stopped and hovered and then took off .

content.detailedDescription:
Me and a few friends were hanging out in my back yard after watching people in the area light off fire works. my neighbor himself lit off more than most of the other parties combined and it was comparable to the town in brightness, loudness and quantity. we were still looking out over the skies to see if anyone else was as well as just star hunting as we do quite frequently. stars can be rather hard to see being as close we are to nyc, about 15-20 minutes, as well as ample noise pollution which was only added to by the holiday. 

all of a sudden, we saw 3 orbs/lights in a triangular formation, which at first we thought was embers from fire works or even those candle balloons that float up into the sky. however after a few minutes of them not moving, not flickering and staying in formation, it seemed unlikely and also that someone would only light off 3 was odd. it had been more than enough time since my neighbors fireworks that they also wouldn't be embers. one odd thing i did note, pets/wildlife were very quite all of a sudden. almost every one of my neighbors owns some sort of yappy little dog so there are always dogs barking, but they weren't. 

by this time of us that saw it were in awe of some kind, unable to look away from the spectacle. i was really excited, but after talking to my friends the next day, they seemed a bit more nervous than excited. i immediately started discussing what it was, to make sure that we were all seeing something at least. stars, planets, satellites were ruled out for how bright they were, and close they seemed. the ones of us without glasses were able to see a black triangle behind them also. it was very dark. the object appeared to be about half a mile up, near the height of a cessna plane, maybe at an angle of 45* about a street over. it looked to be about twice as long as your standard cessna plane also. it was very hard to see any more detail than that. 

it was not moving, just hovering there for a good bit almost in the exact center of all the parties lighting off fireworks, like it had come to investigate. it just sat there like that while we debated amongst one another what we were looking at, grabbed our phones and take several pictures in which you can see the lights. 

being that the isis warnings for the holiday and all that, we thought maybe it was a military plane checking on things, again as we are that close to nyc. then as silently and quickly as it showed up over the area, it was gone. it almost looked as if someone had just shut lights off on the orbs more than they zoomed away. basically just vanished. we stared at the skies for a little longer to see if we could gain sight of it, but it was no where. 

i still am rather excited and have been staring at the photos since then, talking to other "star gazers" to see if anyone else saw it, knew what it may be, etc. before reaching out to mufon.
content.summary: Black triangle, 3 orange lights, one at each point.

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were in a local bar after watching the us womens world cup game.  we were just hanging out, drinking a couple of beers, and talking about the match.   one of the bartenders that works at the bar came in to have a drink on his off time.  he walked through the door and had a very surprised look on his face.  we asked him what was wrong, and he said he may have just seen a ufo.  i didn’t believe him at first, but then he started to tell me that it has been hovering way up in the sky for about two hours.  we went outside so he could point out the object, and sure enough it was hovering in the sky very high above the city.  my judgment on distance may be a little off, but from how big it was in the sky, it looked like if it had landed it would have been very large.  it had the oddest shape to it.  it had what seemed to be very distinct and sharp edges and was chevron shaped.  i thought that it might be a bomber or a drone, but it never moved, not once.  i thought that my eyes just may be adjusting, so i used a building in front of me for perspective on the motion of the object, and from what i gathered it did not make any movements.  i stayed in one spot for about 30 minutes and didn’t move one time.  i was kind of confused because i don’t know of any planes that can hover that long in the sky without moving.  we stood outside and pointed it out to people walking by.  some were interested and started taking pictures, and some just said it was a drone or a plane and ignored it.  after standing there for about 45 min, we went back into the bar.  we came back out about 30 later, and it was still there.  i then had to leave because i had plans that i had to keep, but when i left, the object was still in the sky.
content.summary: It was a black chevron like object with very sharp corners.  it hovered over the city and did not move.

content.detailedDescription: While visiting the park on july 4th, my family and i were getting ready to watch the firework show. at approximately 9:25 p.M. while waiting for the show to began, i noticed a bright object in the northern sky. it seemed to hover or stay in place, but appeared to be approaching at the same time. it then appeared to move slightly to my left, then hover in place. then it moved to the right, all the while, appearing to come closer. my first thought was that it was a helicopter, until it changed directions and moved to the left, then to the right. i continued to watch it because i was very curious at this point as to what it was. after several minutes, it seemed to disappear or go behind a cloud. after a few minutes, it reappeared. it seemed to be closer the second time. i tried to video the object but before i could, it was gone. it was at this time, that i called my friend who is also a field investigator for mufon. i called him according to my cell phone at 9:27 p.M. after witnessing the object twice. while i was describing to him what i had just witnessed, the object appeared again, brighter than it had been before. i promptly told him it was back and had to hang up so i could video the object. my phone call according to my cell phone was 3 minutes and 29 seconds when i hung up. that means, the closest time that i could pinpoint to seeing the object for the third time, was 9:30 and 30 seconds.It took me approximately 10-15 seconds to have my phone up and video the object. my wife who was very close to where i was standing, also videoed the object at my request. two of my oldest children, age 10 and 7, also witnessed the object. mr. moore received my wife's video to review, but i also have a second video to show him.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: From 9;25 to approximately 9;33 the object appeared, dissapeared 3 separate times. the last of which was captured on two separate cell phone cameras with about one minute of  footage each

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i had gone to the local park (centennial park) late one night after the bar, we had bought some off-sales and thought we would wind down at the park before going home. after about 20 min we noticed a single red light kinda dancing in the sky. it had no real direction. all we could see was a bright red light.  after a few min's we both noticed 2 more joining from the west. it was almost like they were playing in the sky, they would alternate doing flyby's and fly circles in the sky. we watched for a good 5 min, sitting still against the old swimming pool, then it was like a snap of a finger they were gone. we both were confused as to what happened, was nothing like we had ever scened. i knew in the back of my mind it was nothing human. we sat waiting wondering if they would return, about 10 - 15 min after they disappeared they returned doing the same thing. they came in about 3 s apart, same area. we watched for aprx 3 min, they would swirl and fly random patterns and passing (head on) each other close before one had disappeared, 5 s later the last two followed. the thing that burned into my mind was how fast they came & left. they took off in a straight line from where we were sitting, almost at a 45' angle leaving a faint red line. to this day we still have no idea what they are, i started looking into it and appears that these red lights have been scene else where. i am an avid watcher of your show, and i am very happy to have found a place to report to. my friend can also vouch to what happened, i wish i had known about mufon earlier, i thought it would be best to report even tho it was so long ago. thanks
content.summary: Observed 3 red orbs / objects playing in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was attending the 4th of july (7/4/2015) fireworks show in irving, tx with friends. it was held on lake carolyn in the las colinas section of irving. the show started around 9:30 pm.  a little while into the
event, one the friends i was with asked if i saw a green object in the sky toward the direction of the fireworks. i did see the green, round object. we were sitting a safe distance from where the fireworks were being fired, but almost directly in line of the area and the green light was to the right. dfw airport is west and a few miles from the area and in the direction we were looking. (in fact, before the object was seen, we had seen a passenger plane and commented on what the passengers must have seen and thought of the fireworks). i turned to another friend sitting on the other side of me and pointed it out to her. she also saw it.  the object never moved, changed colors or anything. we all kept glancing toward it but it never moved and it stayed the same.  when the show was over after 10:00 pm and we were picking up our chairs to leave, we noticed that the object was gone, and nowhere to be seen. i believe the object was a ufo because it would have still been there if it were part of something in the area. i am probably the only one of the three of us to believe in ufo's especially since i had a previous experience in the mid-60's as a teen in oklahoma.
content.summary: Green orb in sky with fireworks

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We were shooting off fireworks when we noticed 2 objects bright orange/red moving in random patterns. it had no strobe lights to indicate it was an aircraft. it moved in patterns an airplane could not do. it moved too fast for a helicopter to do the patterns it did. plus they were glowing, almost a light pulse, but the color was red to orange. it also lit up some clouds it passed through. they eventually within 2-4 seconds just faded and were gone. after the two were gone a third was seen low in the tree line. we moved over to clear the trees and saw basically the same thing. it moved similar to the other two then climbed high and to our left, then looked like it moved away from us then 2-4 seconds it faded out quick. total time that we observed these objects was 3-5 minutes. when reviewing a few pics we noticed a green bowtie looking thing in one of the pics. none of us saw this when observing the three glowing orb like objects.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We were shooting off fireworks when we noticed 2 objects bright orange/red moving in random patterns

content.detailedDescription: driving home from new hudson, mi walmart around 10:30pm on 7/4/15 est in south lyon, mi. i was driving and my girlfriend was a passenger heading south on pontiac trail just north of 9 mile rd. my girlfriend noticed 3 linear red dots to the far west while watching all of the local 4th of july fireworks. when she told me about them i took a quick look. all three were dark brownish/red and not flashing from the glimpse i caught. they were moving slowly in the same direction (which seemed to be toward the south east). they moved so slowly it was basically hovering but it could have also been because they were far away and moving somewhat toward my location that they seemed like they were slow. they also seemed pretty far apart from each other (if they were as far away as i think maybe 1/2 mile away from each other) but moving in the same direction. from their distance on the horizon i could only guess they were probably over the whitmore lake area. i was driving so my girlfriend got a much better look. they looked like stars or planets at first until i noticed that they were moving. then i was thinking maybe balloons but how crazy would a balloon pilot be if they were to fly in pitch black darkness on the 4th of july and risk getting hit by fireworks? after first seeing them we were only a couple minutes from home. once parked we were in a blind spot and could no longer see them. we went around the house to look more and only 1 of the 3 was still visible. that one faded out within a minute of us looking at it. it almost faded fully once, then got back to its first brightness level, then faded completely. it was still to the west but now higher in the sky when it faded. neither of us took video because we were driving for most of it and they were not so breathtakingly abnormal that either of us felt compelled to. it was just kinda weird. neither of us had ever seen anything like it but it still felt explainable. there were no clouds in the sky but there is a chance that they faded because of the dense firework smoke.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three red dots, not blinking, far apart, traveling as if locked in same direction, western night horizon, vanished.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was in my yard and i saw an orb flying around...It was mid day. it was zipping around the sky .....It was bright which was noticeable in the blue sky . i switched my camera to infrared because i was not able to see it with my phone.....Only on infrared . i put my hand into a fist to block the sun , that's what that black blob is....I snapped the photo and there you have the small shaped disc . it hovered very low above me and just hung there . it was large like bigger than a city bus
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb flying around, when photo taken with infrared you clearly see not an orb but a disc

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to see if i could view any fireworks from our house. (we live on a high hill in the country and i wanted to see if we could see fireworks from the nearby towns.)  at first i thought someone had sent a sky-lantern up into the sky because it looked like something floating that was on fire.  i watched it float up and into the sky - but the higher it got and the fact that it was not affected by wind made me realize it wasn't one.  i watched it float/fly across the sky at a steady rate from southeast of my location slowly northeast.  it traveled at the speed of a commercial airliner and i watched it move for several minutes.  from my perspective on the ground, it had a triangular shape and it was fire-orange.  i watched it until it moved further north and i could no longer see it.
content.summary: Triangular object that was bright orange at about the altitude of an airplane traveling northeast

content.detailedDescription: My husband hollered at me to come to the door.. there were two red orbs in the sky just hovering..I thought they was fireworks because it was the 4th of july..But when they started moving it was obvious they were not...They went straight up...Paused and then proceeded to go nw.They went behind the trees so i stepped out on my porch and could still see one...It went black..But i could still see it in the sky ..Then it just took off....Within 1-2 minutes of that a black low flyinghelicopter flew over our house in their direction.The whole thimg was rather shocking to see
content.summary: 2 red orbs

content.detailedDescription: Very fast aproch front se to north orange ball very bright then slow that look like change direction to ne and and star diming to yellow some flashing light up and down of disc shape  move to ne slow an then light go off
content.summary: Orb o disc shape orange fast start / slow change direc. go slow till off

content.detailedDescription:
1. my fiancee, her mother, and myself had just finished setting off fireworks and watching the neighbors do the same. we were all 3 standing in our front yard.
2. my fiancee's mother seen the first light and commented on how fast and orange it was.
3. my initial thought was a fighter jet because of the low altitude, high speed, and straight flight path.
4. the first object was traveling at a high rate of speed in a sraight line. south to north. my guess is that it was about 1,500 - 2,500 feet up and moving close to supersonic. trailing behind the 1st object by approx a 1/4 mile was an identical object moving at the same rate and in the same direction. no flashing lights, only a solid orange glow. it was dark so we couldn't see any of the surface of these objects. only a bright orange light.
5. i felt confused by what we were seeing. ive been to several air shows and have loved planes all my life, so i was trying to figure out what it could be since there were no strobes and no sound coming from these objects. the rate of speed stumped me for there being no sound. 
6. both objects moved straight north until we lost sight of them over the tree line. they appeared to have possibly gained speed after being past overhead.
content.summary: Standing in my yard and 2 fast moving objects in a line flew overhed.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on the back porch, smoking a cigarette at 11 pm friday night when i saw what looked like an airplane over our airport to the east. i was about to walk back inside when it reacted to fireworks that ii heard coming from that direction. it went from completely still at 100-110 degrees from my position to about 50 degrees from my position in 1-2 seconds and came back to a complete stop. it stayed at the same altitude, which was just above the rooftop of the house behind me but looked to be maybe half a mile away from my location. it moved back and forth (left amd right) as i heard and could barely see more fireworks being popped. a big firework was popped and it immediately shot from being just above the rooftops to about 5000 feet within 1-2 seconds and came back to a complete stop. it hover there for at 5000 ft for a couple of minutes without moving at all and then desended back to being above the roof tops until it desended below where i could see and never came back up. i have never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Hovering @ 110 degrees. reacted to fireworks. made rapid changes in direction and elevation between 200 ft and 5000 ft in seconds. last seen just above house line @ 050 degrees from my location. solid red light with pulsating white.

content.detailedDescription: So my prior message was interrupted,this is a follow up of what we saw on july 4th while watching fireworks. the last object flew over our position very high in the sky and while i was looking at it through binoculars it seemed to change shape into a flying saucer that was huge in size. in an instant it sped away out of binocular view .The  disc was orange in color with no visible structure than it being a round smooth disc that seemed to pulse. it took less than one minute to go from horizon to horizon. i'm 57 years old , an avid outdoors man with much time in the field and having a hard time understanding what i saw with my own eyes through a great pair of binoculars. my friends saw the same things without binoculars and some say we saw chinese lanterns. there is no way a candle lit object could have moved across the sky and distance as fast as these orange globes  and what i saw a great distance with binos was bigger than anything i've ever seen in the sky in my lifetime. it was gone in a second.
content.summary: Orange globes changing shape and distance in the sky and a flying saucer

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were lying on the grass enjoying the 4th of july fireworks show in trenton mi. the show started at 10 pm. at around 10:14 pm my wife asked me if airplanes were forbidden to stay in the air during the show, a minute later we saw an airplane in the horizon so question was answered. a couple of minutes later and we both saw a 'green star-like' approaching from west at a considerable speed. we didn't say anything each other until the green dot hovered exactly over the fireworks (at least from our perspective). by that time i was recording a video in my cellphone, so i focused on the green dot and zoomed in. when i stopped my video, the green dot changed from green to red and started moving back west. we thought it was leaving but surprisingly it hovered again, but this time standing far from the main fireworks show and flashing red-orange(or red-yellow, i'm not sure). from time to time we took a look of it, but no change. once the show finished, maybe 5 sec later, the green dot became 3 dots (not sure how the other two dots appeared) making a triangle, one instant after, there was only two dots, one green and one red, and suddenly they went away at a very high speed in west direction, with a very strange movement, think about bicycle pedals: dots up and down in opposite direction but aligned all the time.

once we arrived home, we watched the video (showing the green dot over the fireworks) and then we realized something more strange: right after i zoomed in the green dot, a second red dot is ejected from the green one at a relative low speed, east direction, then as the red dot gets more stable it accelerates at an impressive high speed.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo sighting 4th of july 2015
